text: William Roark Ratliff (born August 16, 1936), is an American politician and engineer. He was a member of the Texas Senate from 1988 to 2004.Bill Ratliff , Texas State Politics, University of Texas Between 2000 and 2003 he was the 40th lieutenant governor of Texas, after Lieutenant Governor Rick Perry replaced Governor George W. Bush. Bush resigned to become president of the United States.Bill Ratliff, A New Texas Star?, National Conference of State Legislatures, April 2001 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Texas Category:American civil engineers Category:Members of the Texas Legislature Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
